title: Love After Death - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/1/19
itunes:title: Love After Death - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/1/19
description:
George Noory and the "Haunted Housewives" paranormal research team of Theresa Argie and Cathi Weber share some stories of ghostly love affairs that lasted after people had died.
